content.title: Check your answers
content.jurisdiction: Your connections to England and Wales
content.confirmWarning: You could be fined or imprisoned for contempt of court if you deliberately submit false information.
content.confirmDissolve: I'm applying to the court for my marriage to be dissolved.
content.confirmDissolvePayRespondent: I'm applying to the court for my marriage to be dissolved, and to order my {{ divorceWho }} to pay some or all of the divorce costs.
content.confirmDissolvePayCoRespondent: I'm applying to the court for my marriage to be dissolved, and to order {{ reasonForDivorceAdultery3rdPartyFirstName }} {{ reasonForDivorceAdultery3rdPartyLastName }} to pay some or all of the divorce costs.
content.confirmDissolvePayBoth: I'm applying to the court for my marriage to be dissolved, and to order my {{ divorceWho }} and {{ reasonForDivorceAdultery3rdPartyFirstName }} {{ reasonForDivorceAdultery3rdPartyLastName }} to pay some or all of the divorce costs.
content.confirmDissolveFinancial: I'm applying to the court for my marriage to be dissolved, and to make financial orders to decide how our money and property will be split.
content.confirmDissolvePayRespondentFinancial: I'm applying to the court for my marriage to be dissolved, to order my {{ divorceWho }} to pay some or all of the divorce costs, and to make financial orders to decide how our money and property will be split.
content.confirmDissolvePayCoRespondentFinancial: I'm applying to the court for my marriage to be dissolved, to order {{ reasonForDivorceAdultery3rdPartyFirstName }} {{ reasonForDivorceAdultery3rdPartyLastName }} to pay some or all of the divorce costs, and to make financial orders to decide how our money and property will be split.
content.confirmDissolvePayBothFinancial: I'm applying to the court for my marriage to be dissolved, to order my {{ divorceWho }} and {{ reasonForDivorceAdultery3rdPartyFirstName }} {{ reasonForDivorceAdultery3rdPartyLastName }} to pay some or all of the divorce costs, and to make financial orders to decide how our money and property will be split.
content.confirmBelieve: I believe that the facts stated in this application are true.
content.confirmApplication: The first statement is your formal application to the court (known as ‘the prayer’). The second is your statement of truth.
content.submitPayWarning: Only submit your application if you can pay now. If you can’t pay now, save and close it and return to it later.
content.tableExplanation: This table has a list of your questions and answers. The first column is the question. The second column is your answer and the third column is a link to change your answer of that particular question.
content.amendJourney: You can amend all parts of your application before submitting.

confirmPrayer.required: Confirm that you’re making an application to the court, and that the information you’ve given is true
confirmPrayer.invalid: Confirm that you’re making an application to the court, and that the information you’ve given is true

content.title: Gwirio eich atebion
content.jurisdiction: Eich cysylltiad â Chymru a Lloegr
content.confirmWarning: Gellir eich dirwyo neu eich carcharu am ddirmyg llys os byddwch yn cyflwyno gwybodaeth y gwyddoch ei bod yn anwireddus.
content.confirmDissolve: Rwy’n gwneud cais i’r llys i ddiddymu fy mhriodas.
content.confirmDissolvePayRespondent: Rwy’n gwneud cais i’r llys i ddiddymu fy mhriodas, a gorchymyn bod fy {{ divorceWho }} yn talu rhywfaint o gostau’r ysgariad neu holl gostau’r ysgariad.
content.confirmDissolvePayCoRespondent: Rwy’n gwneud cais i’r llys i ddiddymu fy mhriodas, a gorchymyn bod {{ reasonForDivorceAdultery3rdPartyFirstName }} {{ reasonForDivorceAdultery3rdPartyLastName }} yn talu rhywfaint o gostau’r ysgariad neu holl gostau’r ysgariad.
content.confirmDissolvePayBoth: Rwy’n gwneud cais i’r llys i ddiddymu fy mhriodas, a gorchymyn bod fy {{ divorceWho }} a {{ reasonForDivorceAdultery3rdPartyFirstName }} {{ reasonForDivorceAdultery3rdPartyLastName }} yn talu rhywfaint o gostau’r ysgariad neu holl gostau’r ysgariad.
content.confirmDissolveFinancial: Rwy’n gwneud cais i’r llys i ddiddymu fy mhriodas, a gwneud gorchmynion ariannol i benderfynu sut y rhennir ein harian a’n heiddo.
content.confirmDissolvePayRespondentFinancial: Rwy’n gwneud cais i’r llys i ddiddymu fy mhriodas, a gorchymyn bod fy {{ divorceWho }} yn talu rhywfaint o gostau’r ysgariad neu holl gostau’r ysgariad, a gwneud gorchmynion ariannol i benderfynu sut y rhennir ein harian a’n heiddo.
content.confirmDissolvePayCoRespondentFinancial: Rwy’n gwneud cais i’r llys i ddiddymu fy mhriodas, a gorchymyn bod {{ reasonForDivorceAdultery3rdPartyFirstName }} {{ reasonForDivorceAdultery3rdPartyLastName }} yn talu rhywfaint o gostau’r ysgariad neu holl gostau’r ysgariad a gwneud gorchmynion ariannol i benderfynu sut y rhennir ein harian a’n heiddo.
content.confirmDissolvePayBothFinancial: Rwy’n gwneud cais i’r llys i ddiddymu fy mhriodas, a gorchymyn bod fy {{ divorceWho }} a {{ reasonForDivorceAdultery3rdPartyFirstName }} {{ reasonForDivorceAdultery3rdPartyLastName }}yn talu rhywfaint o gostau’r ysgariad neu holl gostau’r ysgariad, a gwneud gorchmynion ariannol i benderfynu sut y rhennir ein harian a’n heiddo.
content.confirmBelieve: Credaf fod y ffeithiau a nodir yn y cais hwn yn wir.
content.confirmApplication: Y datganiad cyntaf yw eich cais ffurfiol i'r llys (sef ‘y deisyfiad’). Yr ail yw eich datganiad gwirionedd.
content.submitPayWarning: Peidiwch â chyflwyno eich cais os na allwch chi dalu nawr. Os na allwch chi dalu nawr, dylech arbed y cais, ei gau a dychwelyd ato yn nes ymlaen.
content.tableExplanation: Mae’r tabl hwn yn cynnwys rhestr o'ch cwestiynau a’ch atebion. Mae'r cwestiwn yn y golofn gyntaf. Mae eich ateb yn yr ail golofn ac mae’r drydedd golofn yn cynnwys dolen ichi newid eich ateb ar gyfer y cwestiwn hwnnw.
content.amendJourney: Gallwch newid unrhyw ran o’ch cais cyn cyflwyno.

confirmPrayer.required: Cadarnhau eich bod yn gwneud cais i’r llys, a bod yr wybodaeth a ddarparwyd gennych yn gywir
confirmPrayer.invalid: Cadarnhau eich bod yn gwneud cais i’r llys, a bod yr wybodaeth a ddarparwyd gennych yn gywir
